  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String nric, String password, String name, int age, MaritalStatus maritalStatus)
      Constructs a new User object
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC Must not be null
      password - The user's password. Must not be null
      name - The user's name. Must not be null
      age - The user's age
      maritalStatus - The user's marital status. Must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any required field is null
